properties.name: ratelimiter.redis-key-prefix
properties.description: Prefix used for Redis rate-limit keys.

properties.name: ratelimiter.fail-open
properties.description: Allows requests when Redis backend fails.

properties.name: ratelimiter.include-http-headers
properties.description: Adds Retry-After and RateLimit headers to HTTP 429 responses.

properties.name: ratelimiter.metrics-enabled
properties.description: Enables Micrometer metrics when a MeterRegistry is present.
